about_the_game:
Get swept by the stylish and vibrant world of Blade of Tsunami and bring down a tidal wave onto corporate scum in lighting-fast combat that rewards precision and speed.

Vengeance for the betrayed

You are Nami, stricken by tragedy at the hands of Fujitsu-Yaro. A ruthless businessman, who took your father’s life and now wants to claim and tear down your ancestral land to erect his cold, industrial monuments of greed and exploitation. It is up to Nami to bring justice like a crushing wave and restore balance to the world while staying true to yourself in the process.

The Tsunami rises

Dash right into action thanks to approachable controls and cut down foes on large, elaborate stages that blend a visual style inspired by traditional Far East aesthetics with cold steel and neon lights of a cyberpunk dystopia. Employ a wide range of skills to blitz through your enemies, while avoiding areas spiked with environmental hazards.

WISHLIST NOW!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your father is dead, his life cut-short by a ruthless corporation. Take up the blade and enact vengeance in a visceral, fast-paced, isometric slasher that blends cyberpunk with a visual style heavily influenced by traditional Japanese aesthetics.
